Source Alchemy Manual pg. 21, Elves of Golarion pg. 23

Statistics

Category Alchemical Weapons

Description

Behind the head of this arrow is a small receptacle of alchemical material that heats up when exposed to air and eventually combusts; barbs on the arrowhead pierce the pouch when it hits a target.

If you hit a target with a slow burn arrow, it deals damage as normal, but at the beginning of your next turn, the arrow bursts into flames and deals 1d6 points of fire damage to the target.

Alchemical Recipe

Recipe (70 magnesium + 80 myrrh + 25 phosphorus)/congelation; Craft 25
Time 10 minutes; Tools alchemist's lab; Type alchemical weapon
